metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8111 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Apache Tomcat Connectors (mod_jk) before 1.2.41 ignores JkUnmount rules for subtrees of previous JkMount rules, which allows remote attackers to access otherwise restricted artifacts via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: libapache-mod-jk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
